note: I'm an e-commerce expert and website developer specializing in UI/UX, currently a Frontend Engineer at Deno, previously at Shopify. I create innovative projects like Quina.app and PlayHondo.com and share insights on JoshCollinsworth.com. Passionate about Svelte, I've developed an open-source blog. Based in the Kansas City area, I'm a lifelong Nintendo fan and advocate for diversity, equity, inclusion, and accessibility. Opinions are my own.
